ComicInfo.Title: Mad’s Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; Survivoyeur; What is a Compassionate Conservative?; Some Who Wants to Be a Millionaire Questions We’d Love to See Regis Ask; Spot Your Parents!; The Lighter Side of...; A Rug’s Life; A Totally Honest Message from Bill Gates; The Case For/Against Gore/Bush; Sports Memorabilia Cards We’d Like to See; The Intimidator LX 2000 Owner’s Manual; A Mad Look at the Olympics; Monroe and… the Family Heirloom; When Clowns Go Bad; The Perfect Snore
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, flying, family dining, competition, dating, relationships, therapy, problems, beliefs, literature, dancing, the office, intelligence, and doctors.
